ur_of_chaldees: Raised in Ur of the Chaldees, one of the greatest cities of the ancient world. Center of moon god worship (Nanna/Sin). Massive ziggurat dedicated to Nanna still stands. Family likely involved in idol-making (Joshua 24:2). Terah his father, Sarai his wife, Lot his nephew.
call: Called by God out of idolatry to become father of many nations (Genesis 12:1-3). Left Ur around age 75.
covenant: God promised land, seed, blessing. Covenant sealed with sacrifice (Genesis 15), circumcision (Genesis 17), name change from Abram to Abraham.
